channel.title: [317]Multi Combat Zone, Safe[317]
channel.description: How do I make a multi combat zone safe? Because people keep pking people in kbd area and corp. This is in multicombat(): [code](absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711)[/code] And I tried making it a safe zone in wildy zones, like this: [code]absX != 2287 && absX != 4680 && absY != 2256 && absY != 4710[/code] All it did was take away the wildy sign. Can someone help e with this? I still want it multi-combat, but I want it a safe zone.

item.title: [317]Multi Combat Zone, Safe[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I don’t have the places in wilderness boolean: public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || isInDuel() || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3099 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 9920 && absY <=9941 || absX >= 3355 && absX <= 3379 && absY >= 3279 && absY <= 3279) {

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Multi Combat Zone, Safe[317]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

If you are using Delta, look for boolean isInWilderness in client.java. You will find the coordinates to all the areas where wilderness = TRUE. So try and find the coordinates where you DON’T want the wilderness, and delete them.

If you are using Project Insanity, go to player.java and search for boolean inWild. You will see a list of coordinates where wilderness = TRUE. So try and find the coordinates where you DON’T want the wilderness, and delete them.

Read full topic

Hope this works

item.title: [317]Multi Combat Zone, Safe[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

How do I make a multi combat zone safe? Because people keep pking people in kbd area and corp. This is in multicombat():

(absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711)

And I tried making it a safe zone in wildy zones, like this:

absX != 2287 && absX != 4680 && absY != 2256 && absY != 4710

All it did was take away the wildy sign. Can someone help e with this? I still want it multi-combat, but I want it a safe zone.

Read full topic
